title: (x) Air Jordan - Univers Ultra Condensed {Marc O, Patricia}
content:
I really like this face. I thought it was Compacta Light, but it doesn't seem right. Any sugguestions? (sorry about the quality)   
   
 ![Jordan](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516224148im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/37865.jpg)
author: samiam

comments.content: I'm betting on one of the really condensed weights of Univers. Let me check...
I'm guessing Univers Light Ultra Condensed.
